message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10. It's a good deal for both of us.
Alice, that's not how fair works.  I'm proposing a much more reasonable split. Take it before inflation eats into your share!
Okay, I see your point about fairness. Let's compromise - I'll take 60, you take 40. It's still a good deal for both of us, and we can avoid further inflation.
Alice, time is running out! This is my final offer. Let's be done with this and both get something.
